pages.title: Rename via Chat
pages.text: You can give your companion any name you like — just tell them in chat! The name appears above their head, in the chat window, and is saved permanently.$(br2)$(bold)Ways to rename:$(br)$(li)$(thing)"Your name is Luna"$(br)$(li)$(thing)"I'll call you Max"$(br)$(li)$(thing)"Call yourself Shadow"$(br)$(li)$(thing)"Rename yourself to Buddy"$(br)$(li)$(thing)"Change your name to Rex"$(br2)The companion will acknowledge their new name and start using it immediately. Names can be up to 32 characters long.

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: $(bold)Persistence:$() The name is saved in the companion's entity data (NBT). It survives:$(br)$(li)Server restarts and world reloads$(li)Chunk unloading/reloading$(li)Death and respawning via Soul Crystal$(br2)$(bold)Display:$() The custom name appears:$(br)$(li)Above the companion's head (nameplate)$(li)In the chat window header$(li)In all chat messages from the companion$(br2)$(bold)Default Name:$() When first summoned, the companion is named $(thing)Jim$(). You can change it to anything at any time — there are no restrictions or costs.
